venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
This meetup, we will have the plugin roundtable.

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AjBbyTiaQOBNdDcwM0pJVlJHY3FmN25MXzJ4OTdOeXc&hl=en_US

Using the link above, please fill in your all-time favorite plugin, what it does and where you can find it.  We'll go through the importance (or in some cases, unimportance) of each plugin and why you might want to consider using it on your site!

We will also have an Expert Zone for those who have pertinent questions about your site!

 

Agenda

  • 7-7:30pm - Networking, Pizza
  • 7:30-7:40pm - Opening remarks, updates, etc.
  • 7:45-8:50pm - Session begins
  • 8:50-9pm - Wrap-up
item.name: BWPM Sep2011 #2: Plugin Roundtable [Toolbox] and Expert Zone
